definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Monadic Boolean algebras also have an important connection to modal logic.
sentences.chinese: 一元布尔代数还与模态逻辑有重要联系。

sentences.english: IDENTITY is also called Exclusive-NOR. The article also discusses operation laws and priorities in Boolean algebra.
sentences.chinese: 文中还讨论了布尔代数的运算规律和运算次序。

sentences.english: The most intuitive development of boolean algebras arises from the concept of a set algebra.
sentences.chinese: 布尔代数最直觉的发展产生与集合代数的概念。

sentences.english: The maximum cut sets of this fault tree are got through the Boolean algebra simplifying method.
sentences.chinese: 使用布尔代数化简法确定了该失效树的最小割集。

sentences.english: These elements compare two values, producing a boolean result.
sentences.chinese: 这些元素比较两个值，产生一个布尔代数结果。

sentences.english: Monadic Boolean algebras have an important connection to topology.
sentences.chinese: 一元布尔代数与拓扑学有重要联系。

sentences.english: Every Boolean algebra contains a prime ideal.
sentences.chinese: 所有布尔代数都包含一个素理想。

sentences.english: Boolean algebra is the system where electronic computer can do logical operation.
sentences.chinese: 布尔代数系是适于电子计算机作逻辑运算的系统。

sentences.english: Simple enumeration method is a convenient method to prove identities in Boolean algebra.
sentences.chinese: 简单列举法是证明布尔代数恒等式的简便方法。

sentences.english: The underlying principles of the application of this technology are electrical circuits and Boolean algebra.
sentences.chinese: 对这项技术应用的基本原理是电路和布尔代数。

definition: rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
Cantor (name)/Georg Cantor (1845-1918), German mathematician, founder of set theory 集合論|集合论[ji2 he2 lun4]
